Small Tabs Styleguide

Style Guide

Elements

Elements are the foundation of the system. Simply using typography and color, well designed Elements can begin to express the site's personality.

  • Color Palette
  • Typography

Components

Elements are combined and modified to create components. Components are designed to serve specific functional roles within the system.

  • Recently Added block
  • Contact list
  • Daily Special Listing
  • Featured Special
  • Finder
  • Site Footer
  • Site Header
  • Nearby Bars list
  • Listing Rollup
  • Recently Updated block

Templates

Based on the needs of the content, Components are arranged into specific layouts to create Templates.

  • Home Page › Prominently displays the Finder interface, a featured special, and a complete list of cataloged neighborhoods, should a user want to simply browse by neighborhood instead of doing a detailed search.
  • Find a Bar Page › Displays specials results per search query the order of most recently updated.
  • Bar Page › Displays location, special and contact information content for a single bar.

Small Tabs is a product created by @mattmesker.
